title: BANKING OPERATIONS
utme_requirements:
Five (5) credit passes at SSCE or its equivalent in English Language,  Mathematics Economics  and any other two (2) subjects from the following:

Commerce, Business Methods, Government, Civic Education, Biology/Agricultural Science, Computer Studies, Home Management, History, Geography, Literature in English, Stores Management, Financial Accounts, Shorthand, Office Practice, Insurance, Tourism, Data Processing,Store Keeping, Book Keeping, Animal Husbandry, Marketing, Salesmanship, Principles of Cost Accounting.
subjects: Mathematics, Economics, Geography, Government, Commerce /Principles of Accounts.

title: BUSINESS INFORMATICS
utme_requirements: The WASC, GCE ‘O’ Level or the Senior Secondary Certificate (SSC) or their equivalent with five credits including English Language, Mathematics, Economics/Commerce (Literature in English and Oral English are not acceptable in place of English Language) and any other two subjects from Business Methods, Principles of Accounts, ICT, Geography, Government, Agricultural Science/Biology, Physics Chemistry, Civic Education, Insurance, Data Processing, Book Keeping, Store Keeping, Office Practice, Shorthand, Stores Management, Computer Studies, Marketing  and Accounting.
subjects: English Language and any other three (3) subjects from the following: Mathematics, Economics/Commerce, Business Methods, Principles of Accounts, ICT, Geography, Government, Agricultural Science/Biology, Physics, Chemistry, Civic Education, Insurance, Data Processing, Book Keeping, Store Keeping, Office Practice, Shorthand, Stores Management, Computer Studies, Marketing and Accounting.

title: COMPUTER HARDWARE ENGINEERING TECHNOLOGY
utme_requirements: S.S.C.E or its equivalent. Credit passes in Physics, Chemistry, Mathematics, English language and any other one from Metal works, Technical Drawing, Basic Electronics, Biology or Agricultural Science, Geography, Further Mathematics, ICT, Computer Studies, General Woodwork, General Metalwork/Auto-Mechanic, Basic Electricity or Applied Electricity, Technical Writing/Building/Engineering Drawing and Statistics.
subjects: English Language and any other three (3) subjects from the following: Physics, Chemistry, Mathematics, Metal works, Technical Drawing, Basic Electronics, Biology or Agricultural Science, Geography, Further Mathematics, ICT, Computer Studies, General Woodwork, General Metalwork/Auto-Mechanic, Basic Electricity or Applied Electricity, Technical Writing/Building/Engineering Drawing and Statistics.

title: COMPUTER SOFTWARE ENGINEERING TECHNOLOGY
utme_requirements:
Five (5) O'level Credit Passes in not more than two (2) sittings in English Language, Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry, and One(1) other subject from the following:

Biology, Information Communication Technology (ICT)/Computer Studies, Basic Electricity/Applied Electricity, General Woodwork, General Metalwork/Auto-Mechanics, Agricultural Science/Animal Husbandry, Geography, Technical Writing/Building/Engineering  Drawing, Further Mathematics, Statistics, Food & Nutrition/Hotel & Catering, Health Science.
subjects: Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry, Biology/Agricultural Science, Geography.

title: ISLAMIC BANKING & FINANCE
utme_requirements:
Senior Secondary School Certificate (SSCE) or its equivalent (Teachers Grade II, WASC, GCE Ordinary Level), with five credit passes in English
Language, Mathematics and any other three subjects from the following: Economics, Business Methods, Principles of Accounts, Islamic Religious
Studies (IRS), Literature in English, Commerce, History, Statistics, Geography, Government, Marketing and Agricultural Science/Biology Civic Education, Insurance, Data Processing, Book Keeping, Store Keeping, Office Practice, Shorthand, Stores Management, Computer Studies, Marketing  and Accounting obtained at not more than two sittings; or Candidates with ND, HND or Bachelor’s degree who wish to re-skill or those with Certificate in related Financial and Business Studies with good standing work experience from the Banking and Finance Industry can be considered.
subjects: English Language and any other three (3) subjects from the following: Economics, Business Methods, Principles of Accounts, IslamicReligiousStudies(IRS), Literature in English, Commerce, History, Statistics, Geography, Government, Marketing, Agricultural Science/Biology, Civic Education, Insurance, Data Processing, Book Keeping, Store Keeping, Office Practice, Shorthand, Stores Management, Computer Studies, and Accounting.

title: MULTIMEDIA TECHNOLOGY
utme_requirements: Five (5) O'Level Credit Passes in not more than Two(2) sittings in English Language, Mathematics and three (3) other subjects from the following: Physics, Chemistry, Biology/Agricultural Science, Geography, Fine Art/Technical Drawing, Economics, Civic Education, Government/History, Literature in English, Marketing, Hausa Language and Islamic Studies.
subjects: Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry, Biology/Agriculture, Geography, Economics, History/Government.

title: NETWORKING & SYSTEM SECURITY
utme_requirements:
Five (5) O'level Credit Passes in not more than two (2) sittings in English Language, Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry, and One(1) other subject from the following:

Biology, Information Communication Technology (ICT)/Computer Studies, Basic Electricity/Applied Electricity, General Woodwork, General Metalwork/Auto-Mechanics, Agricultural Science/Animal Husbandry, Geography, Technical Writing/Building/Engineering  Drawing, Further Mathematics, Statistics, Food & Nutrition/Hotel & Catering, Health Science.
subjects: Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry, Biology/Agricultural Science and Geography.

title: SECURITY MANAGEMENT & TECHNOLOGY
utme_requirements: Candidates who have successfully completed Senior Secondary School Certificate or its equivalent with credit passes in five subjects to include Mathematics and English Language.
subjects: English Language and any other three (3) subjects in Arts or Sciences.
